description: The fourth level of Impel Down, characterized by extreme heat from a massive pool of boiling blood heated by an enormous fire underneath. Prisoners are subjected to intense heat torture and forced labor, carrying heavy logs to feed the fire. The most severe punishment is being thrown into the boiling blood pool.
keyFeatures: Gigantic cauldron of bubbling blood at the center
Enormous fire underneath the blood pool generating extreme heat
Heat so intense it affects Level 3 above
Prisoners perform hard labor carrying massive logs
Bridge passages crossing over the blood pool

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Falls into Level 4
keyEvents.description: After their battle with Minotaurus causes the floor of Level 3 to collapse, Luffy, Buggy, Mr. 3, Mr. 2, and the defeated Minotaurus all crash into Level 4, narrowly avoiding the pool of boiling blood.
keyEvents.significance: First introduction to the brutal torture environment of Level 4, marking Luffy's progression deeper into Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Magellan Confronts Luffy on Level 4
keyEvents.description: Warden Magellan drops down from above to personally confront Luffy and his allies on Level 4, preparing to use his deadly poison powers to stop their advance.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the major battle between Luffy and Magellan in this scorching environment.

culturalSignificance: Based on the Buddhist concept of the 'Blood Pond Hell' (Chi no Ike Jigoku), where sinners are boiled in blood as punishment for their crimes. Also draws inspiration from Dante's Inferno's circles of hell.
climate: Extremely hot with scalding air that can burn human skin
security: High - guarded by multiple guards and Jailer Beasts, with the extreme heat serving as a natural deterrent to escape
